name: quizonthego
0:
”Alexa, open quiz on the go”
”Alexa, play quiz on the go”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: quiz on the go
des:
Test your knowledge of the US states and their capitals on the go.

States Quiz provides a fun way to keep your U.S. geography skills sharp.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch quiz on the go" or "Alexa, open quiz on the go" to start the game".

At anytime, you can stop the game by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
